results.definition: someone who organizes an exhibit for others to see
expend profusely; also used with abstract nouns
washing yourself by standing upright under water sprayed from a nozzle
examples: he took a shower after the game

results.definition: a sudden downpour (as of tears or sparks etc) likened to a rain shower
examples: a little shower of rose petals
the game was interrupted by a brief shower
Meteors showered down over half of Australia

results.definition: a party of friends assembled to present gifts (usually of a specified kind) to a person
examples: her friends organized a baby shower for her when she was expecting

results.definition: a plumbing fixture that sprays water over you
examples: they installed a shower in the bathroom
The guests showered rice on the couple

results.definition: take a shower; wash one's body in the shower
examples: You should shower after vigorous exercise
